title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.42 - Town of Tonawanda
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.42 - Town of Tonawanda

State Regulations
(a) [Repealed]
(b) Morgan Avenue. Morgan Avenue between Route 384 and Young Street. (c) Young Street. Young Street between Morgan

Avenue and Route 384. (d) Broad

Street. Broad Street between Route 384 and Route 265. (e) Kenmore Avenue. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Kenmore Avenue between Route 324 and Vulcan

Street. (f) Sawyer Avenue. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Sawyer Avenue between Route 266 and Kenmore

Avenue. (g) Knoche Road. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Knoche Road between Elmwood Avenue and

Route 265. (h) Ensminger Road. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Ensminger Road between Route 265 and Milens

Road. (i) Milens Road. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Milens Road between Ensminger Road and
its terminus. (j) Woodward Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Woodward Road between Route 265 and a
point 2100+- feet west of Route 265. (k) Vulcan Street. The southwestbound roadway
of Vulcan Street between Route 266 and Kenmore Avenue. (l) Flyder Avenue. The northeastbound and
southwestbound roadways of Flyder Avenue between Route 324, Grand Island

Boulevard, and the terminus of Flyder Avenue. (m) Ericson Street. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Ericson Street between Military Road, Route 265, and

Ontario Street. (n) Ontario Street. The northeastbound and southwestbound roadways of Ontario Street between

Military Road, Route 265, and Ericson Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8114.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
